summary: A brand new character in the Alternate Start lobby waiting to choose a new adventure.
descriptionHtml:
[img]http://i716.photobucket.com/albums/ww163/liquidillumination/KeairaSaveGame00b_zpscf27df0c.jpg[/img]
======================================================================================

As requested, here is a copy of my save game from the Alternate Start (Live Another Life) lobby room. This character is inspired by the Age of Conan character "Keaira" and her looks are tailored to resemble that particular femme-fatale.

Required mods:
-- Alternate Start
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/9557//?
-- Ningheim Race
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/35474//?
-- Real Girls UNP Skin (Manually placed in proper Ningheim Folder)
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/36425//?
-- Keaira Warpaint (Must be manually placed in Ningheim tintmask folder)
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/40934//?
-- SG Hair Pack (Though, she'll just load bald if you don\'t have this, so its not save-breaking)
http://www.google.com/

Recommended Mods:
-- Brokefoot UNP Mashup. Keaira's style of clothing.
-- Immersive Armors
-- Immersive Weapons
-- DAGGER MODS - Keaira is a rogue by nature, she likes to kill with knives... Stabstabstab.
-- Lady Keaira UNP Armor (Not on the Nexus. Hard to find, but its out there. If you find it and want my custom textures, just let me know in the Posts section of this mod.)

If you have any questions, feel free to ask me.

======================================================================================
author: CujoHyer
